attributes.action: ensure that if Mike Savage is successful in his defamation claim against the current Home Secretary then it is she and NOT the taxpayer who will pick up the tab.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jaqui Smith had no legal authority nor mandate from the people to put Mr Savage on the list of people banned from this country.  This was therefore an illegal act and it is she who should bear the cost of her criminality and NOT the taxpayer.
